stimulusHtml: Which of the following scenarios is an example of an affirmative action policy?
choicesHtml: A high school athletic program adds a women’s basketball team in addition to its existing men’s basketball team.
A federal contractor actively recruits underrepresented groups for positions in the company.
A company providing a public service is required to serve all customers regardless of race or religion.
A person who cannot afford an attorney is provided one by the state.
